title: Drawing, "Orient Line", June 20, 1934
medium: Graphite, brush and gouache on heavy wove paper
signed: Signed in blue gouache, lower right: McK. K.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: A rope looped through a ship's anchor encircles the globe of the world showing Europe and Africa. Title in light blue text, above: ORIENT; below: LINE.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Orient Line", June 20, 1934.
June 20, 1934. Graphite, brush and gouache on heavy wove paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-553.
